title: DDFP 469: 2016 Vikings with Drew Magary & 'The Food Block'
itunes:title: DDFP 469: 2016 Vikings with Drew Magary & 'The Food Block'
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Deadspin's Drew Magary to discuss the worst Minnesota Vikings losses, the worst children's television characters and his new novel, The Hike. The guys also review the Vikings 2016 schedule in the latest installment of "On the Record." Plus, Shek talks with former offensive linemen Shaun O'Hara and Ross Tucker about the best and worst eating competition foods in the latest edition of "The Food Block." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
